#include<iostream>

int main(){
    
    int T,K;
    long long int N,r,count;
    
    std::cin>>T;
    
    while( T-- ){
           
           count = 0;
           std::cin>>N>>K;  
           
           if( K == 1 )
               std::cout<<N<<"\n";     
           
           else{
               while( N > 0 ){
                      
                      count += N%K;
                      N /= K;
               }
               std::cout<<count<<"\n";
           }
    }
        
    return 0;
        
}
